structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 87, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 436, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 508, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 37, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 275, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 35(4). -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 2. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 1. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 2. -- Created 1951 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 2.
